lead_paragraph: BERLIN, May 1 (From German broadcasts recorded by The Associated Press in New York) -- Adolf Hitler and Premier Mussolini have reached a new accord on all military and political aspects of the war, it was announced in a communique today. It was their first meeting since their countries went to war with the United States last December.
abstract: Jap Amb to Berlin Oshima on Japan-Germany aims
